title: Garden party
creator_credit: Jack Sholder, Paul R. Gurian and ACI Films
brief_description: An adaptation of a short story by Katherine Mansfield, presenting a story about a garden party which continues uninterrupted by a neighbourhood death. Helps stimulate discussion on the meaning of death. A sensitive approach to a difficult theme. It is recommended that teachers preview this film before screening.
